channel.title: Client closes when I click on it twice
channel.description: When I click on any client (like the live game part, with all the graphics not including the inventory and such) twice. I don't know why it does this, and it doesn't do it unless it's logged in. Help would be greatly appreciated. Any ideas? I already tried re-downloading Java.
